The EDR, Auto Still, Animal DC Wizard

grizzled_dwarflord wrote:
This is another attempt at me in the search for building the perfect wizard (I tend to do the same with clerics.  I think it's a sickness).
The Arcane Bastion
As described in the title, this is a 38 CL Wizard with Base 32 Int 400+HP, EDR III, Auto Still III, Animal Domain and DC Casting, 

Base 32 being nice in that when Int is capped to 44, one gets 3 bonus lvl 9 spells

Spells per day with Int capped to 44:
4 9 8 8 8 8 7 7 7 7
= 73 spells / day (4 cantrips)

With a specialty school (perhaps Illusionist) add 10 spells = 83 spells/day. 

Borrowed Grizzled's idea in his build draft The Arcane Bastion for cleric domain for the empowered summons which on a wand (20-50 charges) is extremely powerful. 
Clerics get two domains, the second domain doesn't matter so much, healing would be best for 50% extra healing from cure pots, scrolls but some environments there are restrictions on cleric domains.
The pre-epic cleric level also pushes the Wizard 20 bonus feat to epic levels, which is nice.

Gnome avoids exp penalties but finds it harder to equip full plate till later in the game so I chose dwarf
20% exp penalties from lvl 4 onwards
